ABOUT KG STILES With more than four decades of training and experience as a professional holistic health practitioner, KG Stiles has helped tens of thousands of people to overcome health challenges and realize their goals and dreams. Her clients have included entrepreneurs and top executives, and her services have been used not only by internationally famous celebrities and athletes, but also by individuals, small business owners, spa therapists and hospitals.
